Shower

class dtpr.particles.shower.Shower(iShower, ev=None, wh=None, sc=None, st=None, BX=None, nDigis=0, avg_pos=None, avg_time=None)[source]
BX
__init__(iShower, ev=None, wh=None, sc=None, st=None, BX=None, nDigis=0, avg_pos=None, avg_time=None)[source]

Initialize a Shower instance.

A Shower can be initialized either by providing the root event entry (ev) or by passing each parameter individually.

Parameters:

  • iShower (int) – The index of the shower.

  • ev – The root event object containing event data.

  • wh (int, optional) – The wheel number.

  • sc (int, optional) – The sector number.

  • st (int, optional) – The station number.

  • BX (int, optional) – The bunch crossing number.

  • nDigis (int, optional) – The number of digis.

  • avg_pos (float, optional) – The average position.

  • avg_time (float, optional) – The average time.

__str__(indentLevel=0)[source]

Generate a string representation of the Shower instance.

Parameters:

indentLevel (int) – The indentation level for the summary.

Returns:

The shower summary.

Return type:

str
